lyric:
[00:00.00]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:00.00]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:00.00]Produced by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:30.020]When I was older
[00:36.160]I was a sailor
[00:42.170]On an open sea
[00:54.730]But now I'm underwater
[01:01.338]And my skin is paler
[01:07.269]Than it should ever be
[01:15.810]Mhm
[01:27.989]I'm on my back again
[01:32.590]Dreaming of a time and place
[01:34.659]Where you and I remain the best of friends
[01:39.019]Even after all this ends
[01:45.188]Can we pretend
[01:50.670]I'm on my
[01:53.780]I'm on my back again
[01:58.200]It's seeming more and more
[01:59.430]Like all we ever do is see how far it bends
[02:04.290]Before it breaks in half and then
[02:09.759]We bend it back again
[02:14.479]Guess I got caught in the middle of it
[02:17.419]Yes I've been taught
[02:18.599]Got a little of it in my blood
[02:23.210]In my blood
[02:26.990]Memories burn like a forest fire
[02:30.189]Heavy rain turns any funeral pyre to mud
[02:35.930]In the flood
[02:44.349]When I was older
[02:50.569]I was a sailor
[02:56.900]On an open sea
[03:09.030]But now I'm underwater
[03:15.819]And my skin is paler
[03:21.689]Than it should ever be
[03:31.560]I'm watching movies back to back in black and white I never
[03:34.590]Seen anybody do it like I do it any better
[03:37.620]Been going over you I'm overdue for new endeavors
[03:40.840]Nobody lonely like I'm lonely and I don't know whether
[03:44.020]You'd really like it in the limelight
[03:47.229]You'd sympathize with all the bad guys
[03:50.349]I'm still a victim in my own right
[03:53.610]But I'm the villain in my own eyes
[04:00.939]When I was older
[04:07.490]I was a sailor
[04:13.389]On an open sea
[04:18.980]
tlyric:
[by:符卡]
[00:00.00]
[00:00.00]
[00:00.00]
[00:30.020]当我更加成熟的时候
[00:36.160]我会是一名水手
[00:42.170]在开阔的海域之上驰骋
[00:54.730]而如今我却在水面下煎熬
[01:01.338]我的皮肤愈加苍白
[01:07.269]早不复它应有的血色
[01:15.810]
[01:27.989]再一次重回孤寂
[01:32.590]梦中回忆从前的时光
[01:34.659]在那个你我还是最好的朋友的地方
[01:39.019]即使一切都已结束
[01:45.188]我们能否假装
[01:50.670]我再一次
[01:53.780]再一次回到一个人的孤寂
[01:58.200]一切却好似永无止境
[01:59.430]就像我们所做的不过是 浪花能够绵延至什么地方
[02:04.290]在它被拍碎之前
[02:09.759]我们会再一次将它打碎
[02:14.479]我猜我已被困在海洋之中
[02:17.419]或许我已经学会 如何习惯海洋的侵袭
[02:18.599]深藏于我的血液之中 血液之中
[02:23.210]血液之中
[02:26.990]回忆如同森林大火 焚烧殆尽
[02:30.189]暴雨化作燃料与火柴
[02:35.930]洪流之中
[02:44.349]当我更加成熟的时候
[02:50.569]我会是一名水手
[02:56.900]在开阔的海域之上驰骋
[03:09.030]而如今我却在水面下煎熬
[03:15.819]我的皮肤愈加苍白
[03:21.689]早不复它应有的血色
[03:31.560]一遍又一遍看着同样的电影 黑白电视 未曾
[03:34.590]见过其他人能够比我更合你心
[03:37.620]接着我忘记了你 不费吹灰之力
[03:40.840]没有人能够和我一样孤独 而且我不知道我为何孤独
[03:44.020]你爱我在镁光灯之下的模样
[03:47.229]却也同情那些坏人的遭遇
[03:50.349]一方面我依旧是受害者
[03:53.610]但在我眼里 我才是施暴者
[04:00.939]当我更加成熟的时候
[04:07.490]我会是一名水手
[04:13.389]在开阔的海域之上驰骋
